title: Sardine and Arugula Salad
introduction: Discover the vibrant flavors of Sardine and Arugula Salad, inspired by a delectable Roman dish. This salad combines the peppery taste of arugula, the robust flavor of canned sardines packed in olive oil, and the tanginess of fresh lemon juice. The addition of black cured olives and green onions creates a delightful harmony, all served alongside perfectly toasted Italian bread.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/2 cup black cured olives, pitted and cut into 2 or 3 pieces
2 green onions, cut into thin slices
instructions: Trim the tough stems of the arugula and discard any yellowed or bruised leaves. Wash the arugula in several changes of cool water. Dry very well. Tear the arugula into bite-size pieces.
In a large bowl, whisk together the oil, lemon juice, and salt and pepper to taste. Add the arugula, olives, sardines, and green onions and toss well. Taste and adjust seasoning.
Serve immediately with the toasted bread.
